alert.note: Alert for Caruthers - San Joaquin - Selma; Fresno-Tulare Foothills; Hanford - Corcoran - Lemoore; Visalia - Porterville - Reedley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 28 at 5:36PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Kings, northwestern Tulare and southeastern Fresno Counties through 600 PM PDT... At 536 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Visalia, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Visalia, Reedley, Dinuba, Orosi, Kingsburg, East Orosi, London, Traver, Cutler and Goshen. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Caruthers - San Joaquin - Selma; Fresno-Tulare Foothills; Hanford - Corcoran - Lemoore; Visalia - Porterville - Reedley
